original_title: Last Summer on Earth: Barenaked Ladies, Blues Traveler, Big Head Todd & The Monsters and Cracker
overview: Barenaked Ladies, Blues Traveler, Big Head Todd and The Monsters and Cracker are joining forces for the “Last Summer on Earth” tour 2012. Starting July 6 in Toledo, OH, the tour will hit arenas and amphitheaters through August 19 in Bangor, ME.
title: Last Summer on Earth: Barenaked Ladies, Blues Traveler, Big Head Todd & The Monsters and Cracker
